fullplot: That Burning Feeling is a romantic comedy about the searing pain of looking for love and self in the modern age, and then struggling to make both things coexist happily... It is also about one giant mystery infection with no end and several possible beginnings.
plot: Adam Murphy - a real-estate hotshot and confirmed bachelor - feels the burn of failed love(s), when a social disease takes him face-to-face with a handful of one-night stands, revealing the shortcomings of his own image.
title: That Burning Feeling
